product_name: Patagonia R2 Fleece Jacket - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: So soft you'll want to wear it everyday, the Patagonia R2 fleece jacket for men offers breathable, stretchy warmth that slides quickly under a shell for cold-weather alpine climbing. Smart combination of of 2 types of Polartec(R) fleece fabrics refines the fit, boosts insulation and reduces overall bulkiness. Main body is Polartec(R) Thermal Pro(R) that is breathable, compressible, moisture wicking and quick drying, and it offers a superior warmth-to-weight ratio. Side panels, underarms and lower torso are Polartec(R) Power Dry(R) grided fleece for improved fit, shape retention and abrasion resistance. Offset seams provide comfort under a pack; gussets reduce underarm lift. Center-front zipper is supple with low-bulk seaming; soft, kissing-welt zipper garage at chin provides next-to-skin comfort. Discreet, on-seam thumb loops on the cuffs of the Patagonia R2 fleece jacket for men add coverage. High hand pockets and single chest pocket have slim zippers and zipper garages, and are harness- and pack-compatible; 2 internal drop-in mesh pockets. Closeout.
